product_name: Spark R&D Splitboard Climbing Skins with Tail Clips
long_description: The Spark R&D Splitboard climbing skins with tail clips feature a grippy material that puts the emphasis on traction. The included tail clips provide an incredibly secure hold when you're skinning.
short_description: The Spark R&D Splitboard climbing skins with tail clips feature a grippy material that puts the emphasis on traction. The included tail clips provide an incredibly secure hold when you're skinning.
